To improve your sleep quality, it's essential to focus on reducing your activities during the daytime that contribute to sleeplessness. Some tips include:
1. Set an alarm for bedtime so you know when it's time to go to sleep. This helps prevent distractions and promotes relaxation.
2. Create a comfortable sleeping environment free from noise or disruption. Consider investing in sound-dampening materials like foam pillows or earplugs.
3. Practice deep breathing exercises before bedtime
